meta.job_title: Digital Supply Chain Senior Operational Technology Strategist

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop overall Operational Technology (OT) needs working with the appropriate DTS, plant and staff teams across KCNA.
Develop a strategy to address OT obsolescence needs that aligns with current business plans and capital funding availability.
Build a multi-year strategy that aligns with the SBP cycle.
Gain alignment on the strategy with key business leaders across the KCNA organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain, Engineering, DTS, or related field from an accredited college or university
